sentence.Network_en: Critics viewed him as a reactionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 评论家认为他是一个保守派。

sentence.Network_en: They forced thousands of peasants into their reactionary armies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们迫使成千上万的农民参加他们的反动军队.

sentence.Network_en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentence.Network_cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 所以，民粹主义可以说基本上是一种反动（reactionary）的政治运动，他不是建立在正面的政治理想和价值，如民主、法治、公平、 …
考博英语词汇 ... razor n. 剃刀 reactionary a. 反动的 n．反动分子 reactivate v. 使恢复活动；使复能.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... reaction 反应 reactionary 反动分子 read 阅读.
反动派（reactionary）——试图回到更传统的时代，反对一切社会政治改革。他们从不会同意改革。

list.abs: be persecuted by the reactionary government ., 受到反动政府的迫害.
In reality , the Kuomintang reactionaries are pitifully stupid., 其实 , 国民党反动派是蠢得可怜的.
黑,黑字的解释,查字典 ... 黑板报[ blackboard newspaper] 黑帮[ reactionary gang;sinister gang] 黑不溜秋[ swarthy].
1. 修复性牙本质reactionary dentin 反应性牙本质replica 复模，复制品

entry.def: A reactionary person or group tries to prevent changes in the political or social system of their country.

example.ex: It grew ever more clear to everyone that the Minister was too reactionary, too blinkered...
example.tran: 大家都越来越清楚部长太保守、心胸太狭窄。

example.ex: As long as I have strength, I shall be trying to remove the reactionary forces from the party.
example.tran: 只要我还有精力，我就要尽量清除党内反动势力。

means.word_mean: 1. an extreme conservative; an opponent of progress or liberalism

auth_sentence.content: The club has been run on a reactionary basis.
auth_sentence.res_content: The club has been run on a reactionary basis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The club has been run on a reactionary basis.

auth_sentence.content: Does the brain have a reactionary "cycle"?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does the brain have a reactionary "cycle"?

auth_sentence.content: But their institutions are too often reactionary and cack-handed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But their institutions are too often reactionary and cack-handed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But their institutions are too often reactionary and cack-handed.

means.word_mean: 反动的,反动派的;极端保守的

sentences.en: The reactionary officer then ordered him arrested.
sentences.cn: 这时反动军官下令把他抓起来。

sentences.en: This threw the reactionary police into utter panic.
sentences.cn: 这使反动警察极为惊恐。

sentences.en: The reactionary regime was thrown down by an armed uprising.
sentences.cn: 那个反动政权被一次武装起义推翻了。

sentences.en: Some of the labour leaders were also questioned by the reactionary police.
sentences.cn: 一些工会领导人也受到反动警察的查问。

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂。

sentences.en: The reactionary troops are being hit everywhere.
sentences.cn: 反动派的军队到处挨打。

sentences.en: They forced thousands of peasants into their reactionary armies.
sentences.cn: 他们迫使成千上万的农民参加他们的反动军队。
